item.description:
Movie times have changed! Revised meeting locations and times are below. Please change your RSVP if you cannot make it.


Dinner 5:30pm - Kingston Station, 25 Kingston Street, Boston (reservations under Monica Villar)
I'll arrive at 5:30pm for us early birds for dinner and we'll leave the restaurant at 7pm, so even if you're strolling in at 6:30 come grab a drink with us pre-movie.

Movie @ AMC Boston Common 7:25pm - showtimes have changed!
We'll be arriving from dinner at about 7:10pm, my cell is 773-290-7859 if you need to call/text me.

Please make sure to bring your $1 for Jenny if you have not yet paid.
item.how_to_find_us: After dinner, we'll wait by ticketing for you...call/text my cell 773.290.7859
item.name: Food & Film : Ghosts of Girlfriends Past
